processing_summary.note: CMU pre-college essay development with dad observing and learning coaching methodology - three-way educational experience

scoring_methodology.quality_score: Human-equivalent quality rating (0-1 scale) based on signal density and actionability
scoring_methodology.confidence_score: Embedding confidence based on clarity and completeness of extracted intelligence (0-1 scale)

diagnostic.writing_weaknesses: Redundant phrasing, vague terminology, insufficient specificity
diagnostic.clarity_gaps: STEM-liberal arts needs specification to intersection
diagnostic.dad_questions: Why is Jenny typing so much? Need tough love approach?
diagnostic.specificity_needs: Field trips→group mentoring seminars clubs research required

strategic.interdisciplinary_framework: Four questions position as interdisciplinary thinker
strategic.campus_visualization: Wean Hall turtle entrance makes committee picture student there
strategic.give_and_get_balance: Show what you contribute not just what you receive
strategic.practice_philosophy: Summer programs benchmark readiness for college apps
strategic.parent_education: Dad learning admissions process alongside student

tactical.template_scaffold: Write full structure, student personalizes with specific details
tactical.star_marking: Visual system for tracking revision needs
tactical.paragraph_construction: First time away develops resourcefulness self-reliance
tactical.word_precision: Tense consistency, parallel structure in lists
tactical.research_integration: Wean Hall Python seminars field trips woven throughout

silver_bullets.campus_visualization_technique: Physical details place student in scene
silver_bullets.give_and_get_framework: Balance receiving and contributing shows value

student_level.essay_development: CMU pre-college 'What do you hope to gain' prompt

parent_level.arrival_state: Skeptical about methodology, wants tough love approach
parent_level.questions_asked: Why is Jenny typing so much?
parent_level.transformation: Wow! I'm loving it...it's a class for me too
parent_level.departure_state: Enthusiastic about framework, wishes had this training
parent_level.learning_outcomes: Understanding essay development, admissions strategy, coaching methodology

coach_level.methodology_transparency: Explains every technique as implementing it
coach_level.adaptation_capability: Immediately shifts to hands-off when dad requests tough love
coach_level.dual_teaching: Simultaneously develops essay while educating parent
coach_level.framework_articulation: Unless you ask those questions, it's not coming out

intervention_methods.questioning: What do you mean by that? Can you be more specific?
intervention_methods.research: Find Wean Hall, discover turtle entrance, integrate
intervention_methods.balancing: Add what you'll contribute not just receive

ending_point.clarity: Computer science and media arts intersection clear
ending_point.specificity: Four interdisciplinary questions, Wean Hall visualization

minute_0_26.concern: Why is Jenny typing so much? Is this doing work for student?
minute_0_26.intervention: I don't want you to feel...need to be bit more tough love

minute_26_39.adjustment: Immediate shift to hands-off student-led approach
minute_26_39.dad_observation: Watching student struggle with template personalization

minute_39_51.realization: Wow! I'm loving it...it's a class for me too
minute_39_51.insight: Unless you ask those questions it's not coming out
minute_39_51.closing: I'm learning...really wish I was able to go through this kind of training

coaching_dynamics_evolution.transparency_value: Explaining methodology builds trust with questioning parent
coaching_dynamics_evolution.adaptation_speed: Immediate pivot when dad requests different approach
coaching_dynamics_evolution.dual_audience: Simultaneously teaching student and educating parent
coaching_dynamics_evolution.vulnerability_modeling: Admitting not knowing CMU location shows learning is ongoing
coaching_dynamics_evolution.framework_teaching: Articulating why specific questions unlock depth
